title: Education update in Ibadan: Exam Readiness and After‑School Programs
body:
Experts say exam support is accelerating, with communities reporting practical benefits in everyday life.

Local officials in Ibadan announced support for after‑school programs, aiming to reach more families across the region.

2025-12-26 — In Ibadan, educators highlighted exam readiness as schools adopt new methods to improve student outcomes.

Stakeholders emphasized inclusive access, noting that reliable infrastructure remains key for sustained progress.

Analysts expect new partnerships to emerge, particularly between schools and local tech startups.

The program will roll out in phases, with pilot initiatives scheduled over the next quarter.

Students and teachers welcomed the changes, citing improved engagement and better exam preparation.
